text:
Company: Suarez, Matthews and Johnson

Job Title: Administrator on Duty

Job Type: Full-time

About Us:
Suarez, Matthews and Johnson is a family-owned business that values traditional family values and a strong work ethic. We are seeking an Administrator on Duty to join our team who shares our vision and can thrive in a fast-paced environment.

Job Description:
We are looking for a detail-oriented and organized individual to provide administrative support to our management team. The successful candidate will be responsible for preparing reports, managing schedules, and performing various administrative tasks.

Responsibilities:

 Prepare and distribute reports to management
 Manage and maintain schedules and calendars
 Perform administrative tasks as required
 Provide exceptional customer service

Qualifications and Experience:

 2+ years of administrative experience
 High school diploma or equivalent required; post-secondary education an asset
 Proficiency in Microsoft Office and Google Suite

Perks and Benefits:
We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $45,000 to $60,000 USD per year, based on your experience and skills. We also offer a comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, and vision coverage, as well as a 401(k) matching program.
